TopicTitle: How can i flip my Rocket back vertical

Articles.Content: So i knocked over my rocket and i need help to flip it back vertical from horizontal any ideas? i hit it with my other craf. Curse you mechjeb!
You could eva one of your kerbals and get them to try using their jet packs to nudge it back up.. just remember to F5 and F9 as you go along..
use the rcs and translate laterally until you lift up then burn the main engine on low and land again, simple
Just full thrust till you drive up a hill and off the ground. Works every time.

Sometimes if the rocket is small, you can keep retracting and extending the landing legs and sometimes it glitches out and launches into the air. Then you can fly it down again, its worked once for me.

If you have RCS thrusters and fuel left you can try that. I made a similar mistake and I just folded the landing gear, started trying to right the craft with the thrusters, and then folding the landing gear back down once I was about halfway there, popped me right back upright.
